At present, it is one of the largest producers and dealers in China specialized in chemical reagents, laboratory consumables, instruments and glassware and equipment, lab furniture, etc.
data.text:
LinkedIn and 3rd parties use essential and non-essential cookies to provide, secure, analyze and improve our Services, and to show you relevant ads (including professional and job ads) on and off LinkedIn. Learn more in our Cookie Policy.

Subordinated to Sinopahrm Medicine Holding Company, Sinopharm Chemical Reagent Co.,Ltd(SCRC) is the first company in China specialized in chemical reagent and glassware. At present, it is one of the largest producers and dealers in China specialized in chemical reagents, laboratory consumables, instruments and glassware and equipment, lab furniture, etc. The registered capital sums up to 450 million RMB. Our products are widely adapted to various fields such as colleges and universities, research institutes, testing centers, environmental test, Bio-pharmaceutical & Petrochemical industry, hospital & health sector, space technology, etc. We have subsidiary companies in Beijing, Shenyang, Xi’an, Chengdu, Suzhou, Taicang, and representative office in Nanjing, Jinan, Hangzhou, Dalian and so on. Meanwhile we have set up logistic centers in Shanghai, Beijing, Shenyang, and Xi’an. Based on the company website www.reagent.com.cn, we’re actively developing and promoting E-business platform selling. We’ve put more effort in life science and laboratory equipment sector, with an aim to strengthening “one-stop” service ability. Sales in 2011 hits 1.19 Billion RMB. The company owns product brands of Hushi, Jingshi, Ourchem, Shenbo, SCRC, etc, among which Hushi brand is recognize the “Shanghai Famous Trade Mark” and products of brand Hushi and Ourchem are appraised as the Shanghai Famous Brand Products. The Company sponsored journal of Chemical Reagent is awarded the title of Two Benefits Periodical and received favorable comments from experts, scholars and lab engineers.

Website

http://www.sinoreagent.com/
